term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - crossing over, in biotechnology
term.title: crossing over

item.text: The usually reciprocal exchange of genetic material between chromosomes; part of natural genetic recombination.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 151 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
